summary: Completed frontend testing of mobile header fixes, product page image handling, admin crop functionality, and homepage product card design. Most features working correctly with one minor admin UI issue identified.

integration_issues.issue: Cropper modal does not close automatically after clicking Apply Crop button
integration_issues.details: Modal remains open after successful crop operation, though success message is shown

passed_tests: Mobile header (375px width) shows clean text navigation without icons - Home, About, Products text visible, icons hidden with display:none
Product page GL_001_R displays 7 images correctly on both mobile and desktop
Product thumbnails have horizontal scroll (overflow-x: auto) working properly on mobile
Desktop product page shows all 7 thumbnails correctly
Admin login functionality works with admin/admin123 credentials
Admin edit product modal opens correctly with existing images
Admin crop button opens cropper modal with image and Apply Crop button visible
Admin crop function processes images and shows success message
Homepage product cards display with correct layout - image on top, text below
No text overlap with images on product cards (0px gap, clean separation)
Mobile product card layout maintains proper image-above-text structure
Product cards show proper category, name, price, and action buttons
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix admin cropper modal to close automatically after clicking Apply Crop button. The crop functionality works correctly and shows success message, but the modal should close to complete the user experience.
